description: When requesting a resource without a proper version in the URI, a versions multiple choice (300) response should be given with links to that resource at all versions of the API.
title: OSAPI: Versions Multiple Choice responses do not exist

comments.content: When requesting a resource without a proper version in the URI, a versions multiple choice (300) response should be given with links to that resource at all versions of the API.
